identity.name: Unhinged
identity.aesthetic: Soft Neon x Modern Dark UI (Less Brutalist)

heading_styles.h2: text-3xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight uppercase border-b-4 border-primary
heading_styles.h3: text-xl md:text-2xl font-bold uppercase bg-primary text-black inline-block px-2

colors.gradients: NONE. Use solid blocks of color or noise textures.

layout.grid_system: Brutalist Grid: Visible borders, uneven columns, 'bento' style but chaotic.
layout.spacing: Generous but irregular. Use p-8 or p-12 for sections. Gap-0 for grid items with borders.
layout.z_index_strategy: Layer elements aggressively. Use z-10, z-20, z-30 to create depth without shadows.

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-400 text-slate-900 font-semibold px-6 py-3 rounded-full shadow-md hover:bg-emerald-300 transition-colors
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent text-sky-400 border border-sky-400 font-semibold px-6 py-3 rounded-full hover:bg-sky-500/10 transition-colors
buttons.destructive: bg-rose-500 text-white font-semibold px-5 py-2.5 rounded-full hover:bg-rose-600 shadow-sm

cards.profile: bg-[#111] border-2 border-white/20 p-4 relative overflow-hidden hover:border-[#39FF14] transition-colors
cards.red_flag: bg-red-900/20 border border-red-500/50 p-4 rotate-1 hover:rotate-0 transition-transform
cards.chat_bubble_me: bg-[#39FF14] text-black p-3 max-w-[80%] self-end font-mono border-2 border-black shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_#000000]
cards.chat_bubble_them: bg-[#222] text-white p-3 max-w-[80%] self-start font-mono border-2 border-white/20

inputs.default: bg-black border-2 border-white/30 p-4 text-white font-mono focus:border-[#39FF14] focus:outline-none focus:shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#39FF14] placeholder:text-white/30

visual_enhancers.textures: Use CSS noise overlays or 'scanline' effects.
visual_enhancers.borders: Visible 1px or 2px borders on almost everything.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Hard shadows only (box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px 0px color). No soft blurs.
visual_enhancers.animations: Glitch effects on hover, marquee scrolling text, rapid cuts.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME: Force DARK MODE everywhere. The app should feel like a basement rave or a terminal.
2. FONTS: Import 'Space Mono' and 'JetBrains Mono' in index.css immediately.
3. COMPONENTS: Do NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Use rounded-none or rounded-sm. This is BRUTALISM.
4. BORDERS: Add borders to everything. 'border border-white/20' is your friend.
5. RED FLAGS: Highlight 'Red Flags' with a specific UI component (e.g., a tilted warning sticker).
6. IMAGES: Use the provided 'bad_photos' for user profiles in the feed to sell the concept.
7. COPY: Use the 'tone' defined above. Buttons shouldn't say 'Sign Up', they should say 'ENTER THE CHAOS' or 'MAKE A MISTAKE'.
8. SHADCN: Customize Shadcn components to remove rounded corners and add hard borders.
